citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:25 am on
10/3/24. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door, calling and texting. Licensee responded
to text and no one was available to do an inspection this morning. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and
records for inspection is a violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:25 am on 
10/3/24. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door, calling and texting. Licensee responded 
to text and no one was available to do an inspection this morning. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and 
records for inspection is a violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
